verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> Give לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אֵלִ֑ים <S%H410><s%> of the mighty הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> give לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory וָעֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> and strength

הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> Give לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> the glory שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> due unto his name הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <S%H7812><s%> worship לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּהַדְרַת־ <S%H1927><s%> in the beauty קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of holiness

ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is over הַ֫מָּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> [is] upon the waters אֵֽל־ <S%H410><s%> the God הַכָּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of glory הִרְעִ֑ים <S%H7481><s%> thundereth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is over מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> [is] upon many

קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> The voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּכֹּ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> [is] powerful ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֶּהָדָֽר׃ <S%H1926><s%> [is] full of majesty

ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שֹׁבֵ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> breaketh אֲרָזִ֑ים <S%H730><s%> the cedars וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> breaketh יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> yea the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְזֵ֥י <S%H730><s%> the cedars הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon

וַיַּרְקִידֵ֥ם <S%H7540><s%> He maketh them also to skip כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like עֵ֑גֶל <S%H5695><s%> like a calf לְבָנ֥וֹן <S%H3844><s%> Lebanon וְ֝שִׂרְיֹ֗ן <S%H8303><s%> and Sirion כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> like בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> like a young רְאֵמִֽים׃ <S%H7214><s%> unicorn
קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> The voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD חֹצֵ֗ב <S%H2672><s%> divideth לַהֲב֥וֹת <S%H3852><s%> the flames אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of fire

ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יָחִ֣יל <S%H2342><s%> shaketh מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> the wilderness יָחִ֥יל <S%H2342><s%> shaketh יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> the wilderness קָדֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H6946><s%> of Kadesh

ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יְחוֹלֵ֣ל <S%H2342><s%> to calve אַיָּלוֹת֮ <S%H355><s%> maketh the hinds וַֽיֶּחֱשֹׂ֪ף <S%H2834><s%> and discovereth יְעָ֫ר֥וֹת <S%H3295><s%> the forests וּבְהֵיכָל֑וֹ <S%H1964><s%> and in his temple כֻּ֝לּ֗וֹ <S%H3605><s%> everything אֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> doth every one speak כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> of [his] glory

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לַמַּבּ֣וּל <S%H3999><s%> upon the flood יָשָׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> sitteth וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> sitteth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> yea the LORD מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> King לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עֹ֭ז <S%H5797><s%> strength לְעַמּ֣וֹ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people יִתֵּ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> will give יְהוָ֓ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יְבָרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֣וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people בַשָּׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> with peace
